item.title: After ‘good’ Trump meeting, Zelensky pushes Europe hard to do more
item.description: President Trump and White House envoy Steve Witkoff have said a deal to resolve nearly four years of war between Russia and Ukraine is close.

item.title: Judge in Minnesota rejected federal attempt to charge journalist Don Lemon
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi announced the arrests of Nekima Levy Armstrong, a civil rights attorney; Chauntyll Louisa Allen, a member of St. Paul’s sch...

item.title: Jack Smith defends cases against Trump in high-stakes House hearing
item.description: Former special counsel Jack Smith returned to Capitol Hill to offer his first public testimony defending his efforts to prosecute Donald Trump.

item.title: Trump sues JPMorgan, Jamie Dimon over cutting off banking access
item.description: President Donald Trump filed suit against JPMorgan Chase and its CEO, Jamie Dimon, saying the bank abruptly closed his accounts.

item.title: Trump’s new arts commission signals support for White House ballroom
item.description: The president’s handpicked members of the Commission of Fine Arts are set to review the planned project. The White House hopes to win their approval b...
